data.text: Xili fanyi fan naafuli bɛ,
Banna nun setare birin lan,
Xaxilima na fe xɔrɔxɔɛ to, a a yɛtɛ nan natangama a ma.
Yɛtɛ magore naxan gaaxuma Alatala ya ra,
Tunbee nun gantanyie na tinxintare xa kira xɔn ma,
Fonike matinxin kira fanyi ra,
Banna setare yamarima nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi tɔɔrɛ nan sɔtɔma a sare ra,
Hinnɛnte barakama nɛ,
Mixi mayoe keri, alako ɲɔxɔnsɔsɔɛ xa ɲɔn.
Bɔɲɛ xa sɛniyɛnyi rafan mixi naxan ma,
Alatala nɔndi nan makantama,
Mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi nan a falama,
Gantanyi nan na langoe ginɛ xa wɔyɛnyi ra.
Xaxilitareɲa naxan na dimɛdi bɔɲɛ kui,
Mixi naxan setare tɔɔrɔma geeni nde xa fe ra,
I i tuli mati lɔnnilae xa marasi ra,
A lan i xa e ragata i sondonyi kui,
N wama i rasife nɛ to lɔxɔɛ,
N bara taali tongo saxan sɛbɛ i ma,
alako i xa nɔndi xɔri yati kolon,
I naxa setare rahalaki i xa kɔbiri sɔtɔ,
barima Alatala tan e xun mafalama nɛ,
I naxa bira mixi bɔɲɛ gbe fɔxɔ ra,
xa na mu a ra i fan darima nɛ na mɔɔli ra,
I naxa lu mixie ya ma naxee taanima e booree bɛ,
xa na mu a ra e i xa sade raminima nɛ i bun ma,
I naxa i babae xa naaninyi matɔnxuma saxi ba e yire de.
Walikɛ naxan fata a xa wali ra,
